beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.rapidenv.config.file.ConfigFileTextTaskInsert
beantype.description: Insert a new line at the end or the beginning of the given file. Optionally you can insert the line before or after the first occurence of a line specified by the given search pattern.

property.name: line
property.description: The line that should be inserted.

property.name: mode
property.description: append / prepend define if to append the line at the end of the file or if to prepend it before the beginnig. If regexp is defined the line will be appended after or prepended before the first occurrence of this line.

property.name: regexp
property.description: Specifies the line where to insert before (prepend) or after (append)
